author: Christophe G. Giraud-Carrier and Tony R. Martinez
title: An Integrated Framework for Learning and Reasoning
window: by Lifschitz (1988) and the UCI repository (Murphy & Aha, 1992) contains many useful training sets for inductive learning. This section reports results obtained with FLARE on several of these datasets. Results on a number of other uses of the framework, including two expert systems, are also presented.
